website_summaries.verdict: A dolly with high-quality wheels that allow for smooth movement of the tripod across all hard surfaces.
pros: Legs can extend to 15.7 inches, providing additional versatility
Has a good level of stability, which simplifies shooting high-quality video while moving
Foldable and comes with a carrying bag
cons: Doesn’t work as smoothly as many would like on rough surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Love it hands down!
customer_reviews.text: Its price really surprised me, but I was not confused by it. I gave five stars a rating for the following reasons. Price is only a small part of it, I like its construction. This seems to be very professional, and there is no problem with the heavy-duty tripods. The wheels are made of metal and are durable. The best thing is that the wheels are almost silent and they also have a lock. I mean something that fixes the wheel like a brake. Once folded, it can be carried directly or loaded into a bag case. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: jessica castro

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: Makes work a breeze with these dolly wheels. I bought one for each of my light stands and ringlight. When I'm live streaming my shows I'm constantly moving camera and light equipment around and sometimes it takes time to adjust and effects my audience's patience. But with these I can slide the tripods on my hardwood floors, no scratches or squeaking with the rubber wheels. Legs can extend and spread to fit any tripod base, the screw in clamp keeps the feet in place. Push down locks on the wheels help to keep the dolly in place when I'm done moving it. I'm very satisfied with them and recommend them to any serious cammer!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Move on the butter!
customer_reviews.text: The drag on this tripod dolly is so smooth it's like gliding on butter! I have no issues at all spacing the legs and fitting and locking my tripod into the wheeled frame. The dolly is built supremely well and I can tell it's a super sturdy, mobile base. The legs of the base can adjust and extend depending on how wide spread the tripod base is. Heavy duty and accommodates a lot of weight. I plan on buying at least one for each of my stands soon.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Roller
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this dolly!!! Glad I went with the larger casters...they are nice & smooth. This dolly is solid, well built, easy to adjust & rolls around much better than the 2" casters I purchased previously. Love it soooo much I bought a second one so both of my studio lights are on wheels...thinking about a third for my tripod. Love that it has it's own carrying bag & it should hold up for many years if not 'thrown' around too much. If you are on fence...pull the trigger, you will NOT be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Janel

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Is this price serious? I got a pretty good dolly, carrying my heavy-duty tripod plus a long-lens camera, no problem. Free to move in the spacious studio while remaining stable, no problem as well. Fold it into a small dumbbell and stuff it into the bag in one minute, no problem at all! I don't understand why there are only 90 comments here, it should be in an immediate hit!
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed kheir

customer_reviews.title: Labour saver
customer_reviews.text: This is not a high-dollar item but a must buy for those who always need to deal with moving a lot of photography equipment like me. It's a fantastic labour saver. Tripod legs can be locked securely on it and the dolly wheels roll quite smoothly on the flat floor won't cause any falling or slipping. The bag comes together is also what you would expect: nicely made, clean and well-fitting.
customer_reviews.author: James Ringold

customer_reviews.title: Strong, professional, and productive.
customer_reviews.text: Smooth and silent movement with the rubber wheels. Locking foot hardware for braking and parking. Provides a sturdy base that moves with my tripod so I can travel rooms and easily maneuver my heavy equipment around. Strong, professional, and productive tripod dolly
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Hans

customer_reviews.title: Makes work a lot easier
customer_reviews.text: Great value for price - more sturdy and better than I thought it would be. I like the way that it easily folds up. The wheels are good, big enough to wok well on smooth surfaces, but obviously not for rough ground. Very easy to set up and use! I wouldn't hesitate to fully recommend this to all budding film makers.
customer_reviews.author: Humberto Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and collapsible. The adjustable leg and base extensions make it work for any tripod. My ring light and other stands can all fit into the dolly. Movement is smooth and silent. Push up or down wheel lock is easy to use with my foot. The velcro strap is great to keep it together, and folds right up. Brilliant design.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Blackstone

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy
customer_reviews.text: This tripod dolly really transforms my tripod! The screw knob keeps my tripod feet locked in. Dolly legs have a sliding insert for easy base adjustments and leg length. The wheels are silent and glide smooth across the floor. The step down brake is great for easy locking the tires.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza Marr

customer_reviews.title: Smooth movement
customer_reviews.text: Latge dolly. The wheels glide so smooth! I can transition my tripod from room to room with no issues and it's sooo much faster than trying to pick up a stand that's fully loaded and move it. The legs are adjustable so it fits all kinds of sizes and stays securely locked in since it has a clamp on each one.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! This is the best I bought for the year!! I saw a tripod with wheels, but I already have an awesome tripod. Actually I have been using it for sooo many years(From my first study of photography), we are a great partner. So this Tripod Dolly is very important to me! I think it should work for all, various types of tripods. It fits nicely with MY tripod. And the three feet of the tripod can be locked tightly and ensure safety when moving. It's actually a good installation, and it's a must buy! ! !
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Larger wheels.
customer_reviews.text: With it, you don't have to lift the tripod from the floor, it can slide as soon as you push it gently, and you can start shooting once they are locked in the new position. The wheels are larger than normal products, allowing my camera to smoothly track and shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Gabbert

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and convenient to use
customer_reviews.text: Wheels are large and nice on the dolly. The railing can adjust to fit my tripod. Has individual brakes on each wheel. They move well across carpet, hardwood, and ceramic/tile/linoleum flooring. The brakes are strong. Once locked down, my tripod isn't going anywhere ensured and assured for safety. Folds together nicely for portability thanks to velcro strap to keep it tightly together. Pretty easy to break down and comes with a strong bag with handle for specific storage and carrying around. Smooth moving and makes moving camera equipment easier and much faster than it's ever been! Very strong and professional looking.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Okomo

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: It also comes with a tote case like a violin bag. In fact, as long as I am out with a tripod, I will definitely bring it. Most of the time I just stuffed it into a tripod bag, but I have to say that this is a good plus point. The wheels are also very smooth on the concrete floor, without a big sound. Excellent load-bearing capacity, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

Makes changes angles so much quicker since it locks down stays but I can just push it up with my foot and I'm good to go again.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Parker

customer_reviews.title: BOTTOM LINE: It's worth it if you really need it.
customer_reviews.text: TRUE REVIEW: Uncompensated and actual user. At $36.99, the price seems fair - 5 stars if the price was $25. I was wondering if I should give it a 3-star. The dolly is fairly strong but not for heavy equipment. This could have been a 5-star if the locking mechanisms were not plastic - metal would really have impressed me. You may have to be a little (just a little) careful with the locking mechanism and it looks like it will last. Contrary to some other comments, the wheels are fine. You can't eliminate bumps if the floor not smooth - simple physics. BOTTOM LINE: It's worth it if you really need it.
customer_reviews.author: JosephTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I bought in a long time
customer_reviews.text: Can't express my love for this thing enough. Breathed new life into my trusty tripod. Easy to put on and use. Smooth gliding. Makes footage seem like you are floating if your on a smooth surface. This solely is built with quality too. Always get neewer if you can afford it.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Addition to Any Tripod.

The feet locks are adjustable if you want to lower your tripod really low. The whole thing has a little weight to it but is still a light piece. The unlock is a little funky but easy once you figure it out(push the leg out all the way and lift the pin). I have a large tripod so I keep it on this all the time so I don't have to worry about lugging it around. If you own a tripod this is something you will love having.

customer_reviews.title: it has nothing wrong

customer_reviews.text: I had to return this as the whole point of using sticks is STABILITY and this dolly offers none. Crummy little 1 1/8-inch wheels! Forget this junk.
customer_reviews.author: peederj

customer_reviews.title: Great, but redesign the locks
customer_reviews.text: Love using mine and has made long hours on the job a lot easier. The only issue I have is with the design of the locks. I wish locking and unlocking was a smoother and faster process. I have to press hard with my foot or lock and unlock with my hand, which means I can continue to record during that time or use the footage. It takes 15 seconds, which can be a lot of time in video. When I need to move quickly 15 seconds is the difference between catching and losing a moment on camera. I love how easy it is to carry and it can take a lot of weight.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Thoms

customer_reviews.title: For the light or moderate user, this is a great quality unit. Sturdy. Locks tight. Smooth roller.
customer_reviews.text: For a cheaper product, these are very sturdy. If you are someone who uses something like this occasionally or perhaps even moderately, I think you will find this probably fits your needs for the most-part. It is compact enough to put out of the way and folds up easy. A little ackward going into the bag but nothing not tolerable. The wheels seem to be fairly high-quality and roll smooth. The locks on the bottom tie in your tripod nicely so it is secure. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod

customer_reviews.title: Talk about solid!
customer_reviews.text: Talk about solid?! It's a great price prior to buying a professional Tripod. The wheels sit on surface of floor/asphalt and easily adaptable to most surfaces. It's not flimsy at all. Great for video taping while moving or holding camera steady. It comes with a carry bag, easy to fold tripod & use to travel. I would "hand carry" if I went traveling by airplane ... due to theft. I am so glad I bought this... I threw away all 3 of my tripods... cheaply made & easily breakable. If I had known about this item 5 years ago, I would have purchased it then.
customer_reviews.author: Sissie Lola

customer_reviews.title: WELL constructed

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, rolls well, wheel locks hard to operate

I'm still very happy with this purchase, but that's a thing to note.

customer_reviews.title: Great dolly, good price.

customer_reviews.title: The design is very good, it is very easy to set up in seconds

It is not intended to be used as a filming dolly since it does not roll on a track, it rolls on the floor which is never perfectly fat. Brake levers should be activated and deactivated with the foot and wearing shoes, it has a strong spring that could hurt you if you move it with your hand or a bare foot, please be careful.

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dolly. I have only used it for some test shots at this point so I can get used to it. I like the larger 3" wheels on it and the fact that you can lock a single wheel in place for some spinning/turning shots.

WASTE OF MONEY!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Tripod Dolly

customer_reviews.title: Best portable dolly for small independent artists.

The wheels move smoothly across a flat surface so moving dolly shots in video are great or if I have a light on it, it wont wobble and make the light fall. The tripod and light stands also secure onto the dolly so they wont disconnect while in use. Asbolutely amazed with this.

customer_reviews.title: Makes my jobs much easier now!

Fully adjustable leg locks, really grips the tripod feet by screwing it into the dolly, extendable for different widths so it works with all kinds of sized stands. I do recommend you install all 3 legs of the stand/tripod before tightening. Because the dolly legs extend out, you have extra stability without worry. And the price is perfect!

customer_reviews.title: It is the best.
customer_reviews.text: This dolly is the best. Universal fit since it adjusts to any size tripod with the adjustable base so it fits different base widths. Spring loaded stoppers to lock each leg on. Step on lock brakes to keep it from moving around and just push up when I'm ready to roll. Very secure and sturdy and makes moving my camera around a lot more easier, can't imagine shooting without it now!

product_meta.title: Neewer Photography Professional Heavy Duty Tripod Dolly with Rubber Wheels and Adjustable Leg Mounts for Canon Nikon Sony DSLR Cameras Camcorder Photo Video Lighting
product_meta.description:
Size:2-inch Wheels

Features:

This Tripod Dolly is an excellent dolly for use with your professional camera and video tripods, light stands, and background stands.

Our tripod dolly is very compact and portable and would be a great addition to your studio.

The tripod dolly is basically the same thing as a tripod with the added feature of having wheels attached at the bottom.

The wheels make it easy to create a moving shot while adding the freedom to move the tripod around with ease.

This is a very convenient way of still being able to use the tripod and easily maneuver it without the hassle of having to carry it wherever you go.

The adjustable foot locks also allow you the benefit to lock the wheels in place.

Specifications:

Folds down to 57cm (22.5")

Weighs 2.4kg (5.3 lbs)

Adjustable to fit any tripod

Adjustable foot locks to lock the tripod down

Wheel locks on all 3 wheels

Metal wheels with nylon "tires"

Wheels measure 2 3/4" in diameter

Package Contents: 

1x Tripod Dolly

Dolly and carrying case only, tripod not included
feature_bullets: Quickly and easily transform your tripod to a easily moveable one,have sturdy and quiet shots while moving your tripod
Extendable dolly leg from 274mm/10.8" to 400mm/15.7", just adjust and lock
Tripod clamp knob fits most of tipod leg size
You can tuck the leg and put it in the included carrying bag for better storage and portability
Big handle for firm and comfortable grip
